newsitem.title: USA: Guess? contractors in labor-law compliance.
newsitem.headline: Guess? contractors in labor-law compliance.

text.p: Guess? Inc said Monday a U.S. Department of Labor investigation of the Los Angeles area garment industry in October found no violations by any of the company's contractors.
Guess said its contractors were found to be in complete compliance with all federal labor laws, including minimum wage and overtime pay regulations.

The Labor Department task force investigated 40 contracting companies in the October survey. Those included two Guess? contractors -- P&K Fashion and Infinity Jeans -- and two Guess? licensee contractors -- Genesis Sportswear and U Jeans. All four were found in compliance.
The monitoring program aims to assure that garment manufacturers and retailers take appropriate measures to prevent their goods from being made in illegal conditions.
